bind.jr:constraintMsg: The code must be a two-digit number between 9 and 91
The phone number is restricted to 10 digits, starting with 09

bind.relevant: selected( /data/h_water_time , '2. Number of minutes') and selected( /data/h_consent_hoh , '1.Yes')

select1.label: 3. Region
4. Select Woreda name
5. Select Kebele name

input.label: 6. Collect the GPS coordinates.
input.hint: Stand in front of the doorway of the household's main building to collect the GPS coordinates. Ensure the accuracy is Â±4m.

input.label: 7. Please enter the row number for this household from your sheet
7.a. Household ID
input.hint: Generating household IDs based on kebele and house number

input.label: 7.a. Household ID
input.hint: Generating household IDs based on kebele and house number

select1.label: 8. Are you able to interview this house?
9. Reason why household not interviewed?
11. Did the household head sign a consent form for the household to participate?
12. Did another responsible adult consent for the household to participate?
13. What is the relationship of the consenting adult to the household head?
14. How long has your family been staying in this house?

input.label: 15. What is the name of the head of household?
16. What is the phone number at which we can reach you?
17. How many people live in this household?
input.hint: IMPORTANT: A household is a family sharing the same cooking pot. Household residents include individuals who sleep or share meals here most evenings and consider it their primary residence or who are affected by the decisions of the head of the household.

input.label: 18. How many girls aged 8 or younger live in this household?
19. How many boys aged 8 or younger live in this household?
20. How many girls aged 9 to 14 live in this household?
21. How many boys aged 9 to 14 live in this household?
22. How many women aged 15 and older live in this household?
23. How many men aged 15 and older live in this household?

select1.label: E1. Does your household have electricity?
E2. Does your household have a radio?
E3. Does your household have a television?
E4. Does your household have a refrigerator?
E5. Does tour household have an electric mitad?
E6. Does your household have a table?
E7. Does your household have a chair?
E8. Does your household have a bed with cotton/sponge/spring mattress?
E9. Does any member of this household have a bank account?
E10. What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household?
E11. What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use?
E12. What type of fuel does your household mainly use for cooking?
E13. What is the main material of the floor in your household?
E14. What is the main material of the exterior walls in your household?
E15. What is the main material of the roof in your household?
W1. What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household?
